document.full_text: nbc confirmed that ann curry, now the news anchor, will replace the departing meredith vieira as a principal host in june. natalie morales will replace ms. curry in the news role.
document.title: curry to replace vieira on 'today'
lines_and_colors: nbc confirmed that ann curry, now the news anchor, will replace the departing meredith vieira as a principal host in june. natalie morales will replace ms. curry in the news role.
